learn-ethereum: Learn Ethereum and web3 from A to Z in <underline>Turkish</underline> from the experts in the heart of Istanbul!

students.title: Students
cta: Understand Ethereum and web3's place in the future.
Get to know about university blockchain clubs.
Meet experts in the sector and listen to their career journey.
Find out the job opportunites in web3.

developers.title: Developers
cta: Learn how to develop decentralized applications and smart contracts.
Discover the technical problems Ethereum and blockchains trying to solve.

researchers.title: Researchers
cta: Explore the economical and sociological impact of blockchains.
Get to know about the open research questions and the latest scientific developments in Ethereum.

finance.title: Finance Professionals
cta: Get informed about the outlook of the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) applications, and where they are heading to.
Figure out how DeFi applications such as stablecoins, lending, and derivatives work.
Discover Ethereum's inner financial and economical models.

regulators.title: Regulators
cta: Identify the current status of blockchain technologies in Türkiye, and the opportunities it presents.
Learn the impact of Ethereum and web3 on politics, society, and economics.
Get informed about the related regulatory frameworks across the world.

anyone.title: Anyone Curious!
cta: Get a grasp of what Ethereum and cryptocurrencies are and how they work.
Find out the future significance of blockchain technology.
Discover how Ethereum is used in daily life.

FAQItems.a: ETHGünü, is an event taking place on 13th November 2023 at Istanbul Congress Center during <devconnectLink>Devconnect Istanbul week</devconnectLink> where the Turkish community will meet Ethereum and web3, and the Turkish Ethereum community get together.

Devconnect, is an event week where the global Ethereum community comes together in different cities around the world, consisting of independent events focused on specific topics.

This year Devconnect will take place in Istanbul between 13-19 November! You can read the Devconnect announcement for more information.
During ETHGünü, there will be talks, panels, and workshops throughout the day.

FAQItems.q: What am I going to learn at ETHGünü?
FAQItems.a: You will learn about web3 and Ethereum from A to Z from the experts. You can find everything about Ethereum such as how Ethereum works, how it is used, its economical and sociological impact, Ethereum values such as decentralization, censorship resistance, privacy, and more.

FAQItems.q: I don't know anything about Ethereum. Should I attend ETHGünü?
FAQItems.a: Absolutely! ETHGünü program is designed for people who are not familiar with Ethereum. If you are already familiar with Ethereum, there will be talks and workshops covering more advanced topics.

FAQItems.q: Will I learn about Ethereum's price and crypto trading?
FAQItems.a: No. ETHGünü will be a builder-focused event. Topics such as price and trading, advertising, marketing, and selling of any token or project will not be covered during the event.

FAQItems.q: What is the language of the event?
FAQItems.a: ETHGünü will be mostly in Turkish. Some sessions will be in English.

FAQItems.q: Will there be translation during the sessions?
FAQItems.a: Yes, sessions will be simultaneously translated from Turkish to English and English to Turkish.

FAQItems.q: Will the event be live streamed?
FAQItems.a: Yes, talks and workshops will be live streamed online.

FAQItems.q: Will I be able to watch the talks later?
FAQItems.a: Yes, the sessions will be recorded and published.

FAQItems.q: Can I give a talk or workshop?
FAQItems.a: We will be opening the call for talks and workshops soon.
We will be opening the call for volunteers soon. If you want to contribute in a different way, you can reach us at info@ethgunu.com

FAQItems.q: I missed the ticket sale. Will there be more tickets?
FAQItems.a: Yes. Ticket sales will be in waves. You can subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media to get notified when tickets are available.
